metadata.title: CVE-2024-27024 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net/rds: fix WARNING in rds_conn_connect_if_down If connection isn'testablished yet, get_mr() will fail, trigger connection after get_mr().
